Name: PayJinn GmbH
Company description: PayJinn is a novel fintech provider offering multi bank software solutions throughout Europe. Our dependable cloud platform lets you initiate payments, analyze account information data, automate your accounting, cash flow. Building financial software solutions on top of traditional banking systems is overly complex and requires huge amount of technical and business wise know how. Our team‚Äôs technical expertise and easy to integrate solutions let our customers concentrate on their true business rather than getting lost in the pillars of banking world. We bring together nearly 3000 financial sources from Germany with over 55 million users in a FinTech API and offer an online payment initiation services platform (PISP) and account information services (AISP) according to PSD2. Our FinTech API allows you to trigger money transfer, direct debits or fetch your account data in a multi bank manner. This means PayJinn allows you to control all clearing processes from triggering a payment, invoicing to an order, to matching the payment receipts on your home bank, as well as posting open receivables into financial accounting solutions. DirectPay, our in house payment initiation service, enables electronic payment processes on your web shop to be processed directly from the current account with the familiar online banking data. It is also possible to control and manage external payment funds such as credit cards, instant transfer, PayPal, Sofort, Klarna, etc.

Company description: LawOnChain is an innovative start-up that enters the Legal-Fintech market, with a truly revolutionary proposal on the use of Blockchain technology and automation through Smart Contract.  The LOC software platform, acronym of LawOnChain, will be a saasche platform that will implement a series of services with a purely legal and financial focus. The Blockchain technology works like a secure, immutable and transparent Digital Ledger, shaped in the Decentralization. We aim to highlight the real advantages of Blockchain technology in terms of security, transparency, immutability and automation through modern and innovative decentralized digitalisation.  The particularity of the platform is that of relying on Blockchain technology by exploiting two of its fundamental properties: decentralization and automation of processes through a scripting language that allows one to write actual software code. This code, remapped for example on a legal contract, allows to execute, in fact automatically, a corresponding set of parameters that can be described in a legal contract.  The specific areas that the LOC platform intends to cover are: - Timestamping  - Control of Covenant contracts  - M&A (SPA)  - Escrow Management  - Restructuring

Name: Conax Group AB Publ
Company description: Conax Technology has since 2009 developed unique technologies for the financial industry. The main deliverable for Conax is the patented Multi-Tenancy Delegated Proof of Stake with a goal to deliver blockchain transactions with a speed of max 300ms. The integration of Conax Protocol is important for the financial market where centralized system can be insecure. Conax build typical Distributed Ledger Technologies (DLT) with Multi Tenancy principle. This mean to enable other to operate a secure Neobank and the Ledger is split over difference Node to be secure. The ledger for Conax is based on own develop MTDPoS protocol, this mean all transaction, money flow and account is not possible to be hacked or be able to give to 3party. All Tenancy users Vote democratic for what node the consensus will be done. Benefits: - The MTDPoS make it possible to choose and control what node you want to do the consensus in. - 21 main block producer, democratic voting by the main largest tenancy. - Support unlimited users and store transaction, wallets and main ledger. - Host multiple chain simultaneously. - Support 330ms contactless for the transaction, same as Mastercard demand. - Inter block communication - Conax main chain and all side chain have only one Conax token - Same BPS in all parallel chains. - One group of BPS runs Multiple MTDPoS chain Simultaneously. - All chain follow a unified Inflation reward policy. - Target chain will be selected by dApps.

Name: Refees
Company description: ReFees √® una startup innovativa fintech che vuole far risparmiare commissioni agli investitori.  Spesso infatti la maggior parte delle commissioni sul risparmio gestito (fondi comuni, sicav) sono implicite, quindi non visibili dall'investitore; inoltre tali spese spesso non vengono completamente dichiarate dalla banca o intermediario finanziario, complice il conflitto di interessi che questi soggetti hanno nei confronti del cliente (essi infatti percepiscono delle commissioni di retrocessione sui prodotti collocati). L'ammontare di tali commissioni pu√≤ raggiungere livelli molto alti, ben al di l√† di quanto il cliente si aspetta. Inoltre, la maggior parte dei prodotti a risparmio gestito attivi (che quindi sostengono di farsi pagare cos√¨ cari perch√® dichiarano di portare valore aggiunto al cliente) nel lungo periodo non riesce a battere il proprio indice di riferimento! Oggi esistono strumenti pi√π efficienti a disposizione dei risparmiatori, molto pi√π economici, che replicano fedelmente l'indice sottostante, ma che le banche propongono in misura esigua proprio per il conflitto di interessi sopra citato. L'obiettivo di reFees √® far sapere al cliente, gratuitamente, quanto i suoi investimenti gli stanno costando realmente e quanto potrebbe risparmiare utilizzando strumenti pi√π efficienti. Il servizio Premium √® rivolto poi a chi volesse sapere quali strumenti utilizzare per ottenere tale risparmio. Risparmia oggi, iscrivit a reFees!

Unfulfilled bilateral/swap agreements can also affect a companies bottom line, medii8‚Äôs technology removes the challenges associated with such trade agreements and enforces the commitments through binding smart contracts. Medii8 has the capabilities, experience and technology to resolve your commercial pain points, so your business can focus on the trading and growing your business. Medii8 the e-volution of trading

Name: SpadaFin.
Company description: The value creation for retail investors is in crisis in the asset management industry, where industry incumbents compete based on price and the market is being flooded by rigorous regulations and severe watchdogs‚Äôactivities at an unprecedented extent. Meanwhile Fintech companies are reshaping established business models. We are the drivers of unlocking new business opportunities in the product-distribution-client dimensions on the investment services market in the CEE region. Our industry is regularly disrupted by severe regulations and new business strategies, which require continuous adaption to strategies and to make enormous investments with fairly unpredictable outcomes. SpadaFin‚Äôs aim is to help such companies capitalise on business opportunities that may lead to extensive sales, AUM or operating income growth.   We turn obstacles and challenges into business advantages, similarly to Francis Ford Coppola‚Äôs Wind, where the experimental boat designer‚Äôs simple solution ‚Äì inspired by the flight of bugs ‚Äì allowed the American yacht sailor team to win the America's Cup prize back from their largest rival Australia. Being an advisor is very challenging: we can only be credible and successful if we have an in-depth and comprehensive understanding of products, business processes, compliance requirements, industry standards and of the current sales-driving online marketing solutions.  SpadaFin as a start-up, with its partners in their mid-40s, understands every market gap and weakness, thereby empowering its clients to be more agile and more efficient.  Some of our references, which made us proud: Aegon Fund Mgmnt, UniCredit, OVB, Signal, Erste Bank.  Some market challenges, which made us required: the introduction of MiFID II regulations, online sales‚Äô undeniable importance for B2C, the difficulty of maximizing business potential between product owners and distributors, and the importance of appropriate fund manager response to distributor challenges.

Name: Confianz Capital

Company description: Confianz Capital is a Barcelona based company focused on helping fast growing Scale-ups in Spain and Europe find  expansion capital. Confianz Capital provides three main services: 1.  CAPITAL RAISING.  This includes full life cycle support, from revising the teasers and pitch-books to identifying prospective investors, securing audiences for presenting the opportunity and negotiating termsheets.  COnfianz adds value here by leveraging its network of investors (business angels and VCs) in the USA, Europe and UK. Clients can focus on executing their operations while Confianz leads their capital raising efforts. 2..  MERGERS & ACQUISITIONS.  Having crossed the chasm Scaleups are primarily focused on building their proven business model via rapid growth strategies and/or considering strategic combination transactions. Confianz Capital helps find the right buyers to maximize value for Sell-side mandates as well as minimize the acquisition price for target companies on Buy-side mandates.   3.  INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT. Confianz Capital can help identify and execute the right Go-To-Market strategy to penetrate new markets as well as generate sales in existing markets. Confianz Capital also functions as a neutral broker to help triangulate transactions, offering project management and paymaster roles to control cost, authorize legitimate expenses and prevent scope creep.   The founders of Confianz Capital seek companies which are Scaleups meeting the following criteria: A.  Revenues between $2-10 Million B.  Proven business models and MVP technology C.  Employing 10+ full time staff D. Over 20% growth for each of last 3 years The founders are sector agnostic, but they have experience reviewing innovative companies in: FinTech  |  BioTech  |  SaaS  |  Robotics  |  Industry  |  ML/AI/Big Data  |   AgTech  |  EduTech  |  Med Device  |  Telecom Market Place  |  eCommerce  |  Retail Tech  |  Drones  |  Gaming  |  Wearables  | FoodTech  |  Aerospace

Name: Nexterdam
Company description: An inclusive city We believe that the current system of government policy and market dynamics is leaving middle income households and newcomers out in the cold. Not inclusive. For decades, buying a home and profiting from the rise in asset value has been a middle-class tradition. Nexterdam will ‚Äòcrack the code‚Äô of current residential real estate development and pave the way for new blocks of homes: inclusive and innovative.

Name: Seri√∂se Gesellschaft MbH
Company description: We want to work with people we like on products we love. The products we develop are supposed to make life easier for people and the world a bit better. Technologically, our focus is on data science and creative tech. In recent years, the people in our team collected professional experiences in a large variety of fields including travel, fintech, professional services and hardware development. If, at some point, there aren't enough people with a specific skillset in our team, we can rely on the support of our large network of partners and freelancers. If you want to work with us, you shouldn't expect the next agency carrying out a project with you. We want to be involved from the very beginning and contribute our own ideas and methods in order to build something really cool with you. The people in our team work decentralized, which means we won't sit in your office on a daily basis. Our office is Slack, Hangouts etc. For us, projects don't have a lifespan, because we think that there's always something to do when you want to build a great product. Usually, we start the development of a product in an ideation session with you. Together, we deliberate on your product and consider what the collaboration could look like - followed by a proposal explaining our suggestions for further approach. After developing the MVP (minimum viable product), we frequently recommend the stepwise integration of the product into your in-house IT team. That way, we avoid long-term dependencies and we can focus on what we are best at: rapid development of cool new products. The most important thing for us is our team. That's why we set ourselves high standards for employee participation, salary, working time and so on. Further information on these topics you can find in our mission statement. We won't be wearing suits, we'll try not to bullshit and if we think your idea sucks, we're going to tell you exactly that. That's what we consider seri√∂s.

Name: THE STONE COIN AG
Company description: The STONE COIN AG based in Triesen (Liechtenstein) was founded in 2018 by Swiss crypto and financial investors. The business purpose of the FinTech company includes the issuance of the crypto token THE STONE COIN¬Æ and establishing it as a comfortable, secure and modern form of payment.  Therefore THE STONE COIN AG partners up with international projects that will increase the use of THE STONE COIN and give it instant utility.  The business idea of the company is to combine the flexibility of a crypto currency with the security of a European real estate portfolio. THE STONE COIN¬Æ is a blockchain-based ERC20 payment token / currency token. THE STONE COIN¬Æ is thus based on the decentralized Ethereum Blockchain. The concept and character of THE STONE COIN¬Æ is classified as a license-free payment token. It can be used as a means of payment at appropriate acceptance points and as a means of payment by direct transfer from Wallet to Wallet. It is available nest to Bitcoin on ATMs in Austria and soon in Switzerland, too. Furthermore it is the key currency at the charity portal REAL WORLD INSPIRE where it enables the transfer and delivery of donations to small and medium NGOs around the world. The listing of THE STONE COIN¬Æ on crypto exchanges like LATOKEN, ExMarkets, BitInka and Livecoin enables the trading (purchase and sale) of the token. The supervisory authority FMA qualified THE STONE COIN¬Æ without restrictions as a license-free pure payment token. THE STONE COIN¬Æ is therefore neither a security token nor an asset (backed) token. The company has thus received approval from the FMA for its business activities so that THE STONE COIN¬Æ can be fully issued, sold and used as a means of payment. THE STONE COIN¬Æ is the first payment token launched in Liechtenstein and also the first real estate-based payment token in the DACH region. The net capital raised by THE STONE COIN AG in the token issue will be fully invested in the development and continued operation of a Europ

Name: Oslo Fintech Hub
Company description: Welcome to Oslo Fintech Hub Oslo Fintech Hub is the independent fintech hub in the Oslo region. By giving the fintech community the opportunity to cooperate with financial institutions such as banks, insurance companies, tech companies and other corporates - we want to make Oslo the natural choice for anyone looking to build strong, innovative fintech companies. Our goals 01. ‚Äì Give the fintech community a united voice in meetings with government and authorities.  02. ‚Äì Give entrepreneurs the best possible framework to build their companies 03. ‚Äì Increase the potential for success through successful partnership with corporates and other fintech clusters 04. ‚Äì Create the best work environment for startups Our mission Oslo Fintech Hub is the independent fintech hub in the Oslo region. Our mission is to provide a unified fintech platform for innovation, by bringing to together fintech startups, financial institutions, regulators, service providers and investors. Oslo Fintech Hub is operated by TheFactory, in collaboration with ICT Norway. Since 2016, TheFactory has organised a series of accelerator programs, events, meetups, in addition to building the largest fintech incubator in the Oslo region. Throughout this period we have seen that the startup eco-system has been lacking one key element - a central hub with one thought in mind; to give startups the best platform there is to develop their companies into global players. The Oslo Fintech Hub is established by fintech startups and TheFactory in collaboration with ICT Norway, the interest organisation for the Norwegian ICT industry which represents the full spectrum from the major players down to small entrepreneurial companies. Throughout the fall of 2017, we have established a Nordic fintech collaboration platform with Copenhagen Fintech Lab, Helsinki Fintech Farm and Stockholm Fintech Hub. Together we work to give fintech startups the best opportunity to grow across borders with the best possible partners. In addition, a collaboration with fintech environments such as Finance Innovation in Bergen will give fintech startups the opportunity to grow nationally. Oslo Fintech Hub offers the local fintech eco-system a local and international network for collaboration, learning, networking and investments. With members from the startup community and the financial environment, we believe that amazing things will happen. The interaction between startups and corporates is key for success! Its time for the fintech environment in the Oslo region to get together and join forces with all key players, from startups to corporates, from investors to legislators, in order to make Oslo a centre for fintech innovation and industry collaboration.
